pentacles.name: Ace of Pentacles
pentacles.reversed: Lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight

pentacles.name: Two of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Multiple priorities, time management, prioritization, adaptability

pentacles.name: Four of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control

pentacles.name: Five of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry
pentacles.reversed: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty

pentacles.name: Six of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity

pentacles.name: Seven of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Long-term view, sustainable results, perseverance, investment
pentacles.reversed: Lack of long-term vision, limited success or reward

pentacles.name: Eight of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development

pentacles.name: Ten of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution
pentacles.reversed: The dark side of wealth, financial failure or loss

pentacles.name: Page of Pentacles
pentacles.reversed: Lack of progress, short-term focus, procrastination, delaying

pentacles.name: King of Pentacles
pentacles.upright: Wealth, business, leadership, security, discipline, abundance
pentacles.reversed: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth and status
